evaluation_criteria.coverage: should comprehensively capture all important patterns and concepts from the data
evaluation_criteria.actionability: should encapsulate a single concept that is clear and actionable
evaluation_criteria.distinctiveness: should be clearly distinct from other themes without overlap
evaluation_criteria.relevance: must accurately reflect the participants' experiences and concerns

notes.acceptance_threshold_info: Score out of 5.0 - themes must average this score to be accepted
notes.max_iterations_info: Maximum number of refinement cycles before stopping
notes.chunk_size_info: Number of words per chunk (3000-5000 recommended)
